name: Andrew Jones
description: Andrew Jonesis the sheriff of theSouthern Californiantown ofYuccainLos Padres County. Andrew Jones served in aNUSAmilitary special forces operations unit known as the "Silver Shoguns" during theUnification Waragainst theFree States. After the war ended, Jones became the sheriff of the small town ofYucca,Los Padres County, in theBadlandsof the NUSA-loyalist state ofSouthern California. He bore a strong prejudice against outsiders to Yucca, especiallynomads. IfVhas theNomad lifepath, Sheriff Jones caught V inMike'sautoshop.
